Articles.Content:
Bringing back the old thread. Post any military related craft in here. Cruisers, missiles, carriers, etc.

I miss the old thread.

Something new: KIDA, Kerbal Interplanetary Defense Administration. Click here!

Edited July 5, 2013 by sodopro
I hope people bring back their designs. This was my daily take-a-peek thread on the forums.

Despite not really being an active KSP member atm (as well as just finding out my profile had been eaten by some kind of space monster), i'll just go and whack together a warship to help revive this place. I hope donlokiman appears soon as his designs were great

Edit: OMG first post............... agin

Talk about speed building, took about 3 minutes to put this together

Ok i present the GN-1A Gunship. It is a light patrol ship for use in kerbins SOI. It has 10 weapons hardpoints and has 6 NERA engines to power it through space both fast and effieciently.

The Booster system is easy to use, powerful and not at all prone to structural failure.

Forgot to add sepatrons to the tanks are rather close to the ship on seperation

I have a couple on things waiting on me passing my driving license exam this wednesday and allowing myself to start KSP to actually launch them. I'll post them here ASAP.

Rune. If I can stick them on top of a Nova safely, that is.
Do you guys have any advice for how to build the substructure of a military ship? Like what order to place parts, how many, etc.?

Place your fuel tanks,rockets,etc first.

Then armor it.
Anyone know who built the ODK-1? I just got it into space, love it, but I don't know who I got it from...

Reporting from the old deleted thread.

The KSS Krakenslayer

100% stock and launched legitimately (using boosters of course)

this was made because someone asked to make a vessel capable of deploying space mines however when i came back to post it the event occurred so here it is launching gravity turn deorbiting image of the mine feild from tracking station Below this are assorted images i was planning on posting to the original thread

How about Jim Raynor's Leviathan Class Battlecruiser, The Hyperion for a defense ship? I'm pretty sure any fleet would enjoy the flagship of Arcturus Mengsk in their ranks. ;D

Here's a link to the thread I posted it in;

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/25794-The-Hyperion
/is it equipped with weaponry?
*Cough* Well, I mean, lore wise? Or did I physically put little missiles on the vehicle or something?
the heck our posts are gone!?! T_T I guess Imma have to repost old stuff as well as my new stuff

Here are my old stuff:

UKSC - Jool Class Frigate:

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/jool-class-frigate-modded/

2 Jool Class Frigates parked at a parking satellite

UKSC - Laythe Class Battleship

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/uksc-laythe-class-battleship/

Awesome shot eh?
Put up a shot where we can see more than the outline pl0x?
comparison size wise to laythe class?

Well, I still find battle cruiser from Macey Dean most eastheticaly pleasing battleship and itÃ‚Â´s firepower is awesome, but there are some drawbacks in design:

- limited ammo capacity

- reaching laythe is problematic if not impossible with ship as is

But still it is main battleship of my fleet until I find a replacement.
Macey's battlecruiser is nice, but it's main anti-capital ships are "dumb" projectiles; they don't move from their path. Their range is also limited, as SRBs tend to spin out after a while.

Well, I see the point of dumb projectile, smart projectiles are just small spaceships flight to collide with another object in orbit, you have to switch crafts and stuff... I find SRBs accurate enough for 500m shots againts large capital ships given my low pilot skills.

Now IÃ‚Â´m equiping all my crafts with light missile consisting of 2 small girders, separator ,6 sepratrons, flat probe, docking port and small nose cone. It is light, part count is not bad and it packs a great punch! Just one hit with this and MaceyÃ‚Â´s battlecruiser is just pile of debris. Hit it with 2 and it will scatter all over the orbit. I will have to test it on carrier ship. This small simple missile can be carried even on light fighters and it makes classical armor inefficient.
anyone have a successful flak gun

This is my first post so it may not be perfect but i hope you like it

i cant come up with a name for it but if you have an idea id love to hear it

this light missile cruiser doesn't use to many parts and is more for looks than anything else. Im lazy and did not make a launch stage (tryin to keep part count down)

Mods used

-B9 aero space pack (good building parts)

-Mechjeb 2.0

-Lazor mod thingy (you know what im talkin about

-Lazor guided missiles that go with the Lazor mod

-i think that's it sorry if i missed one tell me if it does not work:)

I will have a craft file latter

try dual layer armor you wont scratch it
